The large dragon landed with a boom that shook the land around. "My name is
Megaton, I have travelled a long way to find a faction worthy of my might
and skill." The arrogance of Megatron shining through the mighty dragon,
close to 80 feet long stood proud ready to take his place within the ranks
of the Decepticons.


----- Original Message -----
From: Northlight <domnijoeproductions2001@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, August 03, 2001 1:06 AM
Subject: Re: After the pain.


> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > A fully haeled Megaton took flight towards the Decepticon base. He
> was eager to learn about the former Megatron. In the distance he could
> see a group of Decepticons returning to base (Needlenose, Scrapper,
> Spinister and company) the Dragon fealt the urge to make himself
> recognized. "DECEPTICONS STOP AND BE RECOGNIZED." The mutant yelled
> attempting to get thier attention.
>
> ::Blindchaos and Domnijoe::
>
>     Blindchaos, who by now had arrived back at base, was the first to
> meet the incomer.
>     (I wonder what the heck this guy wants) he thought. He looked back
> at Domnijoe, who had also arrived at base at this time. She goined her
> ever-grinning companion in inspecting the intruder.
>     "What's your business?" she demaded of Megaton. She pulled out her
> wrist launcher and aimed it carefully.
>
> Northlight
> Domnijoe Productions
